chemoreception.notes: As terrestrial slugs, Veronicellidae likely rely on chemoreception for navigation, food detection, and mate finding. Inferred due to their lifestyle and general mollusc sensory biology.

mechanoreception.notes: Tactile sense is likely important for navigation and interaction with the environment. Inferred due to their lifestyle as terrestrial slugs.
